name: Thunderaan the Windseeker
tooltip:
Thunderaan the WindseekerLevel 1

To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Wind Seeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian.

Requirements:
- Enchanted Elementium Bar x 10
- Essence of the Firelord DEPRECATED
- Bindings of the Windseeker
- Bindings of the Windseeker
